Pre-Game Insights: The men’s national football team will face Montenegro tonight in the UEFA Nations League at Laugardalsvöllur.
Captain Jóhann Berg Guðmundsson has expressed confidence in the team’s preparation despite injuries.
Montenegro’s brightest star is captain Stevan Jovetic, who is currently without a club.
Many of Montenegro’s players compete across Europe and Asia.
The Icelandic team has dealt with several injuries leading up to the match, with key players missing: Hákon Arnar Haraldsson, Sverrir Ingi Ingason, and Brynjar Ingi Bjarnason.
Jóhann Berg Guðmundsson stated that the team was on the right track and hoped to show that in the match.
Jóhann remarked that tickets can be purchased on tix.is and hoped to see as many fans as possible despite low ticket sales.
Jóhann emphasized the importance of playing their best game and keeping possession to create chances.
